# Hello! Nice to meet you!

My name is Jessica, I am a international student from Taiwan, and currently a junior at Pitzer College, pursuing a combined major in Organizational Studies and Psychology with a minor in Data Science. My academic journey has equipped me with a strong understanding of human behavior and organizational dynamics, allowing me to explore the intersection of psychology and effective management practices along with my data analysis skills.
